content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It sounds like you have a good idea of what you're looking for, and with H&M's wide selection, I'm sure you'll find a graphic tee that fits your style and sense of humor.

Remember to have fun and don't be afraid to try out different combinations. You might be surprised at how a certain tee can elevate your overall look and make you feel more confident.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy shopping, and I hope you find the perfect graphic tee to pair with your distressed denim jeans!

(And don't forget to try on different sizes and styles to ensure the best fit. You want to feel comfortable and confident in what you're wearing!)
